name: Quantum Computing Research Insights Trend Analyzer and Real-Time Notification System

parameters.prompt:
Analyze the following combined quantum computing research data to identify trending topics, emerging research areas, and key insights. Provide a summarized trend analysis with bullet points.

Research Data:

{{ $json.array.map(item => `- Title: ${item.title}\n  Abstract: ${item.abstract}`).join('\n\n') }}

Summarize trends and emerging topics:

parameters.subject: Quantum Computing Research Trends Update
parameters.text:
Hello,

Here are the latest trends and insights in quantum computing research based on your preferences:

{{$json.choices[0].message.content}}

Best regards,
Quantum Insights Team
